name: The Last Target
description:
A short 2D Action Platformer with simple walking, dodging, jumping and attack mechanics that I made to practice Unity 2D.  There's one level with platforming and enemies, where you can explore to find Lore about the story, with a Boss Fight at the end. It should be about  5 - 15 min long, depending on how  much you explore for Lore fragments. 

Keep in mind that there is no Save System,  just a checkpoint before the Boss Fight.

Feel free to leave a comment,  any feedback is welcome!
